title: Broken link
body:
So, it's been a couple hours and this link is still broken. Just putting it out there not that riot checks these till they gain huge amounts of support. 
The exact same address functions on the NA server so I'd say someone failed to put the address on oce correcly. It's hardly a problem considering with a moment of effort you can visit another mirror but it's still a failure of professionalism.

replies.body:
Thanks for the report!  The [page](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/champion-reveal-tahm-kench-river-king) is up for OCE, but the URL looks to be slightly different.

Thanks for letting us know!

Cheers
Mindstar
